description: Module creating Data Adapter services. Factories provided by this module include 'dataadapter.factory[.instance]'. If instance is not provided, object is used as the instance. Services provided by this module include 'dataadapter.dataservice[.instance]'. Data factory provided in configurations is used to create dataservice. Only object is provided to the dataservice. Other services include datadapter.get[.instance]. Channels provided by this module include '/instance' with lower case instance. The channel is a child of configured parent channel or 'root' Other channels include /instance/:id serving datadapter.get[.instance]

dataservicefactory.description: Underlying data service factory. Service instance from this factory are passed the identified object

object.description: Object for which services are being created

instance.description: Discriminator to distinguish multiple services created by multiple instances of the module

middleware.description: middleware to be added to the data adapter factory and all services
